name: Trafalgar Law
text:
Rush (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)
On Your Opponent's Attack Once Per Turn: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. Select 1 of your Characters. Swap the base power of the selected Character with the base power of your Leader during this battle.

effect.text: This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.
You may trash 2 cards from your hand. Select 1 of your Characters. Swap the base power of the selected Character with the base power of your Leader during this battle.
